text: Kiejstut Bereźnicki Kiejstut Bereźnicki (born December 21, 1935 in Poznań ) is a Polish painter, draftsman, and professor at the Academy of Fine Arts in Gdańsk.Józef Golec, Sopot biographical album, Cieszyn 2008, pp. 317–318. ==References== ==External links== *Works 1985-1995 Category:20th-century Polish painters Category:20th-century male artists Category:21st-century Polish painters Category:21st-century male artists Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Artists from Poznań Category:Polish male painters
title: Kiejstut Bereźnicki
